tips.title: Active Recall
tips.details: Instead of rereading, test yourself on the material to strengthen memory.

tips.title: Spaced Repetition
tips.details: Review topics over increasing intervals to move information to long-term memory.

tips.title: Teach Someone
tips.details: Explaining a concept out loud helps you understand it deeply.

tips.title: Remove Distractions
tips.details: Keep your phone away and turn off notifications during study sessions.

tips.title: Study Environment Matters
tips.details: Sit at a desk with good lighting to improve concentration.

tips.title: Set Small Goals
tips.details: Break large tasks into smaller, manageable steps so you donâ€™t feel overwhelmed.

tips.title: Practice Questions
tips.details: Doing questions is one of the best ways to prepare for exams.
